title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Singapore 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2021, and finally roughly constant from 2021 to 2024.
The line significantly decreased by 2.59 from Year 2018 to 2019, and lastly, increased by 0.44 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 3.7 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.55 was reported at Year 2019

max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2021, and finally roughly constant from 2021 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.

The line rapidly decreased by 82.48% from Year 2018 to 2019, and lastly, increased by 80.0% from Year 2019 to 2020.
